Analyzers

Class CGrammarAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Analyzers.CGrammarAnalyzer

  • public class CGrammarAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which contains operations for checking a grammar for well-formedness, and to perform additional analysis tasks.

    I.e, Sets: First, Follow and Last and predicates: null, reach and empty.
